ARABIC: وَكَمْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن نَّبِىٍّ فِى ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: How many Prophets We sent to the previous peoples!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Many a prophet had We sent to the earlier communities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: How many a Prophet did We send to the earlier peoples!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: How many Messengers did We send to the ancient people?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And how many Prophets We did send among the earlier people!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And how many a Prophet have We sent amongst the men of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And how many a prophet have We sent among the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: How many a Prophet We sent among the ancients,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: How many a prophet did We send among the men of old!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have sent many a prophet to earlier peoples
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And how many a prophet We sent among the ancients.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: How many a prophet We have sent to the former peoples!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But how many were the prophets We sent amongst the peoples of old?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And how many a Prophet have We sent amongst the men of old.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: How many a Prophet did We send to the ancients,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: How many a prophet did We send to the ancients?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And how many a prophet We sent among the former peoples,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:6] And how many a prophet did We send among the ancients!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (How many a Prophet did We send) did We send before you, Muhammad, (among the men of old) among bygone nations; We knew that they would not believe, but We nonetheless did not leave them without messengers and Scriptures!
